document.full_text: oil dropped nearly 3 percent on monday, falling from 32-month highs as concerns that rising fuel costs will erode demand and threaten the economic recovery spurred profit-taking.
document.title: oil falls from 32-month high on demand concerns
lines_and_colors: oil dropped nearly 3 percent on monday, falling from 32-month highs as concerns that rising fuel costs will erode demand and threaten the economic recovery spurred profit-taking.
